text:
Just to confirm.  There's no way to use a HUBD variable inside the JSON object that predefines a slide in a HUBL gallery, is there?  

i.e. I want to have a gallery on a page that uses image sources from a HUBDB
we  roll our own slider when we have to do things like that - HS uses slick slider (slick.js) we use the same one
That's what I figured the best approach would be.  Just wondering if there was some workaround I wasn't able to figure out
<@U54TVT3C1> I have a blog that is going to be talking about this exact thing.

I accidentally deleted a column in my database:disappointed_relieved: HubSpot...please add a feature that requires the user to verify deletion of a column or row. On extra step would have saved me tonight.
did you try using the undo button?
